                                                  String tsCol,
                                                  String keyCol,
                                                  String valueCol)
        Instantiates a JavaTimeSeriesRDD from a DataFrame of observations.
        Parameters:
        targetIndex - DateTimeIndex to conform all the series to.
        df - The DataFrame.
        tsCol - The Timestamp column telling when the observation occurred.
        keyCol - The string column labeling which string key the observation belongs to..
        valueCol - The observed value..

      • timeSeriesRDDFromPython

        public static <any> timeSeriesRDDFromPython(DateTimeIndex index,
                                            org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<byte[]> pyRdd)
        Creates a TimeSeriesRDD from rows in a binary format that Python can write to. Not a public API. For use only by the Python API.
